full_summary:
**Electrical Work - Fire Alarm System Update**
=============================================

**Procurement Title**
--------------------

The Canadian Space Agency invites proposals from qualified contractors to upgrade the fire alarm system at the John H. Chapman Centre in Longueuil, Quebec.

**Reference and Solicitation Information**
--------------------------------------

* Tender reference: PW-22-01003775
* Solicitation number: 9F030-22-0031
* Amendment number: 2 (amendment released on September 28, 2022)
* Publication date: August 9, 2022
* Closing date: October 6, 2022 at 2:00 PM local time
* Tender status: Expired

**Overview and Scope of Work**
-----------------------------

The successful contractor will be responsible for upgrading the fire alarm system at the John H. Chapman Centre. The scope of work includes:

* Upgrading the fire alarm system to comply with current regulations
* Installation and repair of necessary electrical equipment
* Maintenance of the fire alarm system

**Solicited GSIN Codes**
-------------------------

The following National Master Goods and Services Schedule (GSIN) codes are applicable to this procurement:

* 5164CE: Fire Alarm & Detection Systems - Installation and Repair
* 5164CN: Building Electrical Controls - Installation and Repair
* 5164D: Fire Alarm System Maintenance (building related)

**Trade Agreement**
------------------

This procurement is subject to the (Canadian Free Trade Agreement) CFTA.

**Region of Opportunity**
-------------------------

The work is required in the province of Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region).

**Procurement Category**
-------------------------

The procurement category is CNST (Construction).

**Point of Contact**
-------------------

* Name: Melanie Seguin
* Email: [melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca)
* Phone: 438-364-1399

**Tender Documents**
----------------------

Tender documents, including the tender notice and RFP, are available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/3e3ca67e3fb71943b8b96b391db2a9a6/9f030-22-0031_-_request\_for\_proposal\_rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/3e3ca67e3
